mapper.select: select * from tbl_item where item_no = #{itemNo} and is_disabled = 0

select a.item_no item_no ,a.item_name item_name ,a.item_price item_price ,a.item_image item_image ,a.line_no line_no from ( select i.item_no ,i.item_name ,i.item_price ,i.item_image ,l.line_no from tbl_item i join tbl_line l on i.line_no = l.line_no where (l.line_no = #{lineNo} OR l.line_parent_no = #{lineNo}) and i.is_disabled = 0 and l.is_disabled = 0 order by i.line_no )a
where rownum <= 8

select b.* from (select rownum rn ,a.item_no item_no ,a.item_name item_name ,a.item_price item_price ,a.item_image item_image ,a.line_no line_no from ( select i.item_no ,i.item_name ,i.item_price ,i.item_image ,l.line_no from tbl_item i join tbl_line l on i.line_no = l.line_no where (l.line_no = #{lineNo} OR l.line_parent_no = #{lineNo}) and i.is_disabled = 0 and l.is_disabled = 0 order by i.line_no )a )b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8
and b.rn <= (#{page} * 8)
select * from tbl_item where item_name like '%${keyword}%' and is_disabled = 0

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from tbl_item
order by item_no desc) a ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8
and b.rn <= (#{page} * 8)

select * from tbl_item where line_no between ( select floor(line_no / 100) * 100 from tbl_item where item_no = #{itemNO} ) and ( select (floor(line_no / 100) + 1) * 100 from tbl_item where item_no = #{itemNO} ) and is_disabled = 0
and rownum <= 4

select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from tbl_item
order by item_no desc) a ) b where b.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 8
and b.rn <= (#{page} * 8)
select count(1) from tbl_item i join tbl_line l on i.line_no = l.line_no where (l.line_no = #{lineNo} OR l.line_parent_no = #{lineNo}) order by i.line_no
